statements: DELETE FROM adverse_event_reports WHERE patient_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM adverse_event_reports WHERE report_date < '2022-01-01' AND compliance_status = 'Non-compliant';
DELETE FROM ProductSafetyCompliance WHERE manufacturer = 'Generic Pharma Inc';
DELETE FROM ProductSafetyCompliance WHERE approval_date < '2022-01-01' AND manufacturer = 'ABC Inc';
DELETE FROM pharmaceutical_products WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Pharmaceuticals';
DELETE FROM Products WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Pharma' AND dosage_strength = '500mg';
DELETE FROM adverse_event_reports WHERE event_id = 100 AND product_id = 200;
